# Ben Balter

> Technology leadership, collaboration, and open source

Ben Balter is the Director of Engineering Operations and Culture at GitHub, the world's largest software development platform. He helps teams build better software by applying open source principles to internal processes, focusing on asynchronous communication, documentation, and inclusive decision-making.
